segments.text: Have you taken the written test yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should study before you take it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don't you take the test ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you know if it costs any money to take it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Since you already paid for your permit , you don't have to pay again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . Do you know if the test covers the whole book ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , the test skips a lot of things in the book .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you pass it the first time that you took it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I didn't , because it was pretty hard .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I hope that I do well .
segments.speaker: S2
